summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the SeamlessM4T model when processing speech inputs, covering configuration, initialization, forward signatures, pretrained weight loading, gradient checkpointing, saving/loading mechanisms, and gradient retention for hidden states and attentions.
business_intent: Ensure the robustness and correctness of the speech-enabled SeamlessM4T model for production use, reducing regression risk and guaranteeing reliable performance in speech-to-text or multimodal applications.
